name: Slimelvator
description:
Controls

ASDW - Movement of Player
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Throw Case

How to play?

Well... just survive by collecting keys and making it to the end... good luck :)

What went wrong???

Time... time was everything that went wrong really. Not going to blame my 4 children but they really make programming harder when you have no energy left! :D :D
